overview: Director Raul Cristian springs his rough sex hi-jinks on a bevy of young, sexually charged Bucharest beauties: Cruel Media Conquers Romania. In each of six scenes, a submissive Eastern European ingenue (or two) is presented in fetching finery, then manhandled, choked, cock-throttled, tamed and ultimately satisfied. The off-camera director propels the action, issuing orders to the girls, calling them rude names and making lewd suggestions to the thick-dicked studs doing the conquering.
title: Cruel Media Conquers Romania
